E

evaluate() - Method in class sudokuGame.BoardIndividual
Evaluate the fitness of the current individual by letting him try to play and solve the sudoku board.
evaluate() - Method in class sudokuGame.Individual
This method is evaluate the fitness of the individual (how much good this individual), and return Integer num that represent, how much good is the player (smaller is better) 0 result mean zero empty cells remain to solve the sudoku board without conflict, in other word the player (individual) succeed to solve the sudoku.
evaluateGradeboard() - Method in class sudokuGame.BoardIndividual
Evaluate the gradeboard (2D array) that hold in every cell a hash table (map), the hash table holds as a keys the possible numbers that can inserted without conflict in the current index, and as a values grades for the keys that represent how much good is the key as a solution.
Evolution - Class in sudokuGame
Evolution engine that responsible to search the player (individual) who can solve the sudoku board.
Evolution(Population, int) - Constructor for class sudokuGame.Evolution
Initialize the fields of the instance, and determine the max attempts to generate new generations that trying to solve the sudoku board before quit trying.
evolve() - Method in class sudokuGame.Evolution
evolve method is the heart operation of the engine, in this method we search the player who can solve the sudoku board, and if we find him we stop the engine and show the solution, and if we don't find a one who can solve the sudoku board, then we generate a better new generation, and repeat the search...etc We repeat this operations until we reach the max allowed attempts, and then quit anyway, since we can't run forever.
existInCol(int, int, int[][]) - Static method in class sudokuGame.Terminal
This method receive index of column and number (between 1 to 9 in 9x9 sudoku, 1 to N in NxN sudoku), and scan and check if the column contain the num as a solution, return true if it's really exist, false otherwise.
existInRow(int, int, int[][]) - Static method in class sudokuGame.Terminal
This method receive index of row and number (between 1-9 in 9x9 sudoku, 1-N in NxN sudoku), and scan and check if the row contain the num as a solution, return true if it's really exist, false otherwise.
existInRowColSquare(int, int, int) - Method in class sudokuGame.BoardIndividual
Check if the gaven number is exit in the gaven row or column or in the square that border these index [row,col].
existInSquare(int, int, int, int[][]) - Static method in class sudokuGame.Terminal
This method receive the index of cell [row, col] and check if the num is really exist in the square that comprehensive that index.
